text:
[Verse]
Lights so bright they glitter
Dreams on every corner
Street cars pass me by
In this city so high

[Verse 2]
Skyline touching hearts
Starting brand new parts
Whispering in the breeze
Golden memories

[Chorus]
City dreams they fly
Underneath the sky
Echoes in the night
Chasing morning light

[Verse 3]
Crowds they never sleep
Buildings standing steep
Neon signs that speak
Of the hopes we seek

[Bridge]
Steps we take so bold
Future to unfold
Magic in our sight
Everything's alright

[Chorus]
City dreams they fly
Underneath the sky
Echoes in the night
Chasing morning light
title: Dreams in the City
